forecast.day_comments: A slight chance of snow showers between 1am and 2am.  Partly cloudy, with a low around 7. Wind chill values as low as zero. Northwest wind around 7 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
forecast.night_comments: Sunny, with a high near 28. Wind chill values as low as zero. Light and variable wind.
